name: Seth Doyle
comment: For example, if you are designing a brand new website for someone, most times you will have to make sure the prototype looks finished by inserting text or photos or what have you. The purpose of this is so the person viewing the prototype has a chance to actually feel and understand the idea behind what you have created.

name: Ana-Maria Nichita
comment: I am in the process of developing a few new websites for some clients. I have found that they are not always, um, shall we say, 'Timely' when it comes to supply me with the actual copy/content for the site. As you can imagine, I cannot just want around for them to give me the words that go on the page! I need to get moving and develop the site so they can see what it will look like.

name: Warren Wong
comment: I have been waiting. I've been waiting all day. Waiting for Gus to send one of his men to kill me. And it's you. Who do you know, who's okay with using children, Jesse? Who do you know… who's allowed children to be murdered… hmm? Gus! He has, he has been ten steps ahead of me at every turn.
